Journal.Title: Indian journal of critical care medicine : peer-reviewed, official publication of Indian Society of Critical Care Medicine

Article.ArticleTitle: COVID-19 in Pregnancy: Do Parturients Carry a High Risk of Adverse Maternal and Neonatal Outcomes?

Abstract.AbstractText: How to cite this article: Pandya ST. COVID-19 in Pregnancy: Do Parturients Carry a High Risk of Adverse Maternal and Neonatal Outcomes? Indian J Crit Care Med 2024;28(10):897-898.
